interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Bath Body Brush with Super Comfy Bristles for Universal Skin,Long Bamboo Handle Gentle Exfoliation Improve Skin's Health and Beauty Wet or Dry Brushing Back Scrubber for Shower Review Date: 2021/02/02 Store: Zhaoyun Product Description: ['Bath Body Exfoliating Brush,Shower Back Cleaning Scrubber with Long Handle,Dry or Wet Skin Exfoliator Brush with Soft Bristles Back Washer', 'Perfect for Daily Hygiene and Sensitive Skin.', 'Soft Nylon Bristles Be Easier to produce abundant foam,Just add some gel on it and rub the bristles.', 'This Brush will help you a better bath experience, Feel Fresh and Renewed Every Day.', 'Long Reach Handle', 'The Extended 16 inches Long Handle Will Use More Friendly.', 'Note：this brush bristles is too soft so if you want to exfoliate, we recommend using it with a body scrub.'] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '17 x 4 x 2 inches; 7.55 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Zhaoyun'} Review Text: Hi, it’s Glamorous Gem, hope you all are having a wonderful day,

What I like:
Long and Strong Bamboo Handle
Soft As An Angel Feather, Nylon Bristles
Easy To Grip and Hold
Can Be Hung Up Anywhere
The Brush Head Has Small Bump Shaped Nodules for Gentle Exfoliation
Easy To Use and Creates a Overall Pleasant Wash Experience

What I Don’t Like :
Nothing🥰🥰

Anyway, I am used to those cheap dollar store bought back brushes. That seem to be firm but the bristles can be super hard and painful, really hard to find one that is soft.

This one is the opposite. The handle is quite long about 16’. It easily reaches to the middle of my back and easily hits any spots I need to get with a tad bit of stretching. The brush head is super soft, almost angelic. I’m surprised the bristles was made of nylon, the texture reminds me of a soft and durable cotton. When wet, the brush acts as a gentle exfoliating sponge. With small nodules making slight caresses across your skin, getting it clean with little effort needed at all.

It doesn’t hurt at all, if anything it gives the sensation of a gentle massage and a polisher for your skin. Very soothing and really makes your skin shine in the best way possible. My skin didn’t feel sore, worn or even stung after using this. It looked and felt very bright, relaxed and soothed.

Definitely the best shower I had in a minute without having to rely on a loufa for any exfoliation.

After all of it, it even has a string so it can be hung up anywhere you like either in your bedroom or bathroom. Very convenient storage and dries quite fast and easily as well.

Either way, out of all the brushes I have tried this takes the cake as the most handiest and softest of them all. Everyone should have one, your skin would thank you for the extra TLC.

I even included a picture of it when wet, it clumps making it better for scrubbing

PS: No matter the nature, I only write honest, unbiased, and authentic reviews. Thanks for reading 🥰🥰🥰🥰 Review Title: Very Superb Quality Brush, Super Soft And Bristles Are Short But Very Useful Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Jaja Hair Short Bob Wig Brazilian Virgin Hair Straight Bob Wig Human Hair Lace Frontal Wigs For Black Women Remy Hair Wigs 8 Inches {'Package Dimensions': '9.45 x 6.57 x 2.36 inches; 9.42 Ounces', 'UPC': '611550536507'} Hi, it's Glamorous Gem with all your latest review info. I hope you all reading are having a nice day and will continue to do so, like I am :)

Anyway, let me start by saying. I have been wanting to do this review for a while just to give my honest thoughts on it. I have been having to make a couple of life changes. Including for my own hair and the hair I use do to career changes as well as just life changes.

Lately, I haven't been able to really enjoy my 'inches' like I want to, because of the many things I do that disables me from using them. They merely get in the way of the work I have to do, so I decided to go shorter for the meantime.

Now let me start by saying, I usually don't purchase wigs, but considering the maintence is a lot less than doing bundles, I thought it was the best option for now. So after actively searching I stumbled across this hair and I thought it would be an okay buy so I purchased.

Now, it came in a cute little box and as far as I saw, there was no damage. They sent me a perfectly, full wig.

Though, there are a couple things i should mention about it. From first impressions, the hair was very soft, basically like silk through my fingers. It felt softer than any other hair I have bought, so I considered that an overall major plus. As for the length, The ends are evenly curled and blunt cut in the back, but the front isn't so it can fall longer in the front. Though, you might have to curl it again or even straighten it if you dont like two different styles all the way around for it to look right.

As for the density and movement, it's very bouncy and weightless. It looks and feels like very healthy, shiny hair with no foul smells. As for the thickness, it feels very thick and very full. It seems like it's density is very thick all over. No wedges in-between just very wonderful hair.

As for the wig accessories itself, The frontal piece goes very long from the front to the back, which is very great for a wig unlike standard ones. It was clear that they used a 13x4 unlike smaller 4x4's which can make the wig not only more fuller, but to give it a more realistic look.

Though, they didn't pluck it much so you would have to lay your baby hairs for it to look right or pluck it a bit more. Though, the 13x4 looked like it was colored correctly so it should blend it very nicely with all hair types.

It also came with clips and it fit nicely to the head. It wasn't too tight or too loose which is pretty good, considering I have a medium head size, so i think it should fit most average heads.

Overall, I really love this hair. The texture is beautiful and amazingly soft, the size is very fitting, it looks very realistic, and the wig was very well put together. So, of course I would give it a 5/5. It's definitely worth my rating and if you decided to buy, it would be a very valuable purchase.

PS: This is not promotional content and I was not endorsed nor paid by this review. This is my unbiased, unfiltered review and all words remain my own only. Thanks for reading. :)

Edit: I am afraid that it was a bit too short for my head size, so i made a return for a 10' instead and they were very courteous and helpful. Thanks, JaJa Hair :) Very Beautiful and Full Hair!!! Transparent Flexible Silicon Wig Grip Headband, 2Pcs Wig Bands for Making Wigs, Soft Drop-Shaped Wig Hair Bands Scarf, Elastic Grip Band For Wigs Running Sport Headband (Light Brown+Transparent) YMSGIRL {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Fabric Type': 'Elastic,Silicon', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'YMSGIRL', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 3.46 x 1.1 inches; 1.76 Ounces'} Hi, it's Glamorous Gem,
Hope you all are having a wonderful day.

Anyway, I have never been a major fan of wig glue. It can take off your edges and make a mess on your head when you sweat. I try to avoid it less and less due to this.

I am a fan of wearing my wig naked because of those issues, but I am glad that there is a more natural alternative now. I never knew these existed or I would have tried them much sooner.

This set came with a transparent clear wig band and a tan one. I mostly wear the tan one because it blends better with my lace. But, putting it on is very easy and it has a decent tightness. It grips well, but not enough to be super tight.

The band is very stretchy and easy to maneuver. Yet, it has a decent thickness as well. The bubble like grips really help it do its job well. Very durable and strong plastic bands overall.

The band, plus the combs in my wig makes my wig very secure and tight. I haven't had any issue with it slipping or sliding back without me having to move it no matter what I'm doing. When I'm sweating it doesn't move and it fits my head very well overall.

So, I am super glad to have found this. This was a great investment for those that don't prefer glue all the time

PS: No matter the nature, I only write honest and unbiased reviews. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Preferences:** User prefers wigs over traditional hair bundles for lower maintenance, emphasizing shorter styles for practicality. They prioritize softness, silk-like texture, movement, and a realistic appearance in their hair choices.

- **Material Choice:** Strong preference for high-quality human hair and virgin hair.

- **Quality Indicators:** User seeks thorough product details, including density, thickness, and application ease, such as frontal piece size and fit mechanisms.

- **Experience Orientation:** Values excellent customer service and effortless shopping experiences, often sharing feedback on positive interactions and effective problem resolution.

- **Review Behavior:** Passionate about providing honest, unbiased reviews reflecting genuine experiences with products, showcasing a commitment to quality and functionality.

- **Life Changes Impact:** Current lifestyle changes drive a preference for manageable hair solutions and practical personal care items.

- **Aesthetic Trends:** Appreciates fullness, bounce, and realistic styles that enhance their look while being suitable for daily activities.

- **Wig Application Techniques:** Actively seeks alternatives to traditional wig application methods for convenience and comfort, focusing on innovative products that improve wig security without adhesives.

- **Personal Care Validation:** Recently expressed enthusiasm for high-quality personal care products that enhance daily hygiene and relaxation, valuing soft textures and effective utility.

Overall, this user is dedicated to finding high-quality, easy-to-manage hair and personal care solutions that reflect their stylish yet practical lifestyle.
